trans-unit.resname: SPG·1 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lord of Atlantis
trans-unit.target: 亚特兰提斯领主

trans-unit.resname: SPG·1 | Lord of Atlantis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Other Merfolk get +1/+1 and have islandwalk.
trans-unit.target: 其他人鱼得+1/+1且具有海岛行者异能。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator
trans-unit.target: 锐目领航员马科姆

trans-unit.resname: SPG·2 | Malcolm, Keen-Eyed Navigator | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, you create a Treasure token for each opponent dealt damage.\nPartner
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当由你操控的一个或数个海盗向对手造成伤害时，每有一位受到伤害的对手，你便派出一个珍宝衍生物。 拍档

trans-unit.resname: SPG·3 | Bridge from Below | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bridge from Below
trans-unit.target: 阴界渡桥

trans-unit.resname: SPG·3 | Bridge from Below | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature is put into your graveyard from the battlefield, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.\nWhen a creature is put into an opponent's graveyard from the battlefield, if CARDNAME is in your graveyard, exile CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物从战场进入你的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。 当一个生物从战场进入对手的坟墓场时，若CARDNAME在你的坟墓场中，则放逐CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Mephidross Vampire
trans-unit.target: 蔓非沼吸血鬼

trans-unit.resname: SPG·4 | Mephidross Vampire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nEach creature you control is a Vampire in addition to its other creature types and has "Whenever this creature deals damage to a creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature."
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每个由你操控的生物均额外具有吸血鬼此生物类别，且具有「每当此生物对任一生物造成伤害时，在前者上放置一个+1/+1指示物。」

trans-unit.source: Pitiless Plunderer
trans-unit.target: 冷酷袭劫者

trans-unit.resname: SPG·5 | Pitiless Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever another creature you control dies, create a Treasure token.
trans-unit.target: 每当另一个由你操控的生物死去时，派出一个珍宝衍生物。

trans-unit.source: "The trick to getting the biggest share is to be the last one standing."
trans-unit.target: 「分到最多财宝的诀窍，在于活到最后。」

trans-unit.resname: SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Breeches, Brazen Plunderer
trans-unit.target: 莽霸联盟袭劫者布里奇

trans-unit.resname: SPG·6 | Breeches, Brazen Plunderer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nWhenever one or more Pirates you control deal damage to your opponents, exile the top card of each of those opponents' libraries. You may play those cards this turn, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast those spells.\nPartner
trans-unit.target: 威慑 每当由你操控的一个或数个海盗向对手造成伤害时，放逐每位受到伤害之对手的牌库顶牌。本回合中，你可以使用这些牌，且你可以将法术力视同任意颜色的法术力来施放这些咒语。 拍档

trans-unit.resname: SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Dargo, the Shipwrecker
trans-unit.target: 碎船巨人达戈

trans-unit.resname: SPG·7 | Dargo, the Shipwrecker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may sacrifice any number of artifacts and/or creatures. This spell costs {2} less to cast for each permanent sacrificed this way and {2} less to cast for each other artifact or creature you've sacrificed this turn.\nTrample\nPartner
trans-unit.target: 你可以牺牲任意数量的神器和／或生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。对此咒语而言，你每以此法牺牲一个永久物，它便减少{2}来施放，且你本回合中每牺牲过一个其他神器或生物，它便再减少{2}来施放。 践踏 拍档

trans-unit.source: Rampaging Ferocidon
trans-unit.target: 莽闯暴猛龙

trans-unit.resname: SPG·8 | Rampaging Ferocidon | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Menace\nPlayers can't gain life.\nWhenever another creature enters the battlefield, CARDNAME deals 1 damage to that creature's controller.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 牌手不能获得生命。 每当另一个生物进战场时，CARDNAME对该生物的操控者造成1点伤害。

trans-unit.source: Unlike their pack-hunting kin, ferocidons stalk in solitude and lash out at everything that approaches.
trans-unit.target: 与其他聚群狩猎的近亲不同，暴猛龙都是单独行动～它们会潜伏在暗处，然后突然扑向来者。

trans-unit.source: Underworld Breach
trans-unit.target: 冥界裂隙

trans-unit.resname: SPG·9 | Underworld Breach | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Each nonland card in your graveyard has escape. The escape cost is equal to the card's mana cost plus exile three other cards from your graveyard.\nAt the beginning of the end step, sacrifice CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中的每张非地牌均具有逸脱异能。其逸脱费用等同于该牌的法术力费用加上从你的坟墓场放逐三张其他牌。 在结束步骤开始时，牺牲CARDNAME。

trans-unit.source: Carnage Tyrant
trans-unit.target: 杀戮暴霸龙

trans-unit.resname: SPG·10 | Carnage Tyrant | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell can't be countered.\nTrample, hexproof
trans-unit.target: 此咒语不能被反击。 践踏，辟邪

trans-unit.source: Outsiders may marvel at the Sun Empire's "domesticated" dinosaurs, but those who live alongside them know they can never truly be tamed.
trans-unit.target: 外人可能会惊叹于烈阳帝国「驯化」恐龙之壮举，但只有常年与恐龙为伍的人才晓得，它们永无可能真正听话。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·11 | Ghalta, Primal Hunger | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ghalta, Primal Hunger
trans-unit.target: 始饥戈厄塔

trans-unit.resname: SPG·11 | Ghalta, Primal Hunger | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {X} less to cast, where X is the total power of creatures you control.\nTrample
trans-unit.target: 此咒语减少{X}来施放，X为由你操控之生物的力量总和。 践踏

trans-unit.source: Polyraptor
trans-unit.target: 多态迅猛龙

trans-unit.source: Enrage — Whenever CARDNAME is dealt damage, create a token that's a copy of CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 激怒～每当CARDNAME受到伤害时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为CARDNAME的复制品。

trans-unit.source: If you see one, you're already surrounded.
trans-unit.target: 如果你见到一头，你就已经被包围了。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·13 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Kalamax, the Stormsire
trans-unit.target: 唤风君龙卡勒麦

trans-unit.resname: SPG·13 | Kalamax, the Stormsire | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast your first instant spell each turn, if CARDNAME is tapped, copy that spell. You may choose new targets for the copy.\nWhenever you copy an instant spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Kalamax.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放每回合中你的第一个瞬间咒语时，若CARDNAME已横置，则复制该咒语。你可以为该复制品选择新的目标。 每当你复制瞬间咒语时，在卡勒麦上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.source: Lord Windgrace
trans-unit.target: 风华领主

trans-unit.resname: SPG·14 | Lord Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
+2: Discard a card, then draw a card. If a land card is discarded this way, draw an additional card.
−3: Return up to two target land cards from your graveyard to the battlefield.
−11: Destroy up to six target nonland permanents, then create six 2/2 green Cat Warrior creature tokens with forestwalk.
CARDNAME can be your commander.
trans-unit.target: +2：弃一张牌，然后抓一张牌。如果以此法弃掉一张地牌，则额外抓一张牌。 −3：将至多两张目标地牌从你的坟墓场移回战场。 −11：消灭至多六个目标非地永久物，然后派出六个2/2绿色，具树林行者异能的猫／战士衍生生物。 CARDNAME可用作指挥官。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist
trans-unit.target: 晴空号斗士米丽

trans-unit.resname: SPG·15 | Mirri, Weatherlight Duelist | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: First strike\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, each opponent can't block with more than one creature this combat.\nAs long as CARDNAME is tapped, no more than one creature can attack you each combat.
trans-unit.target: 先攻 每当CARDNAME攻击时，本次战斗中每位对手均不能以多于一个生物进行阻挡。 只要CARDNAME已横置，每次战斗攻击你的生物便不能多于一个。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Thrasios, Triton Hero
trans-unit.target: 屈东英雄萨拉希洛斯

trans-unit.resname: SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {4}: Scry 1, then reveal the top card of your library. If it's a land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped. Otherwise, draw a card.\nPartner
trans-unit.target: {4}：占卜1，然后展示你的牌库顶牌。如果它是地牌，则将之横置放进战场。若否，则抓一张牌。 拍档

trans-unit.resname: SPG·16 | Thrasios, Triton Hero | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "When you go where the currents take you, you'll never run short of things to discover."
trans-unit.target: 「大胆让潮流带你四处漂游，从此不再缺乏新鲜事物。」

trans-unit.source: Mana Crypt
trans-unit.target: 魔法力墓穴

trans-unit.resname: SPG·17 | Mana Crypt | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, CARDNAME deals 3 damage to you.\n{T}: Add {C}{C}.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，掷一枚硬币。若你输掉此掷，则CARDNAME对你造成3点伤害。 {T}：加{C}{C}。

trans-unit.source: Many of the ancient civilizations beneath Ixalan were destroyed by outside forces. Others tapped into power they found they could not control.
trans-unit.target: 依夏兰地底曾有无数灿烂文明～其中许多是遭到外敌入侵而衰败，而有些则是染指无力驾驭的力量而毁灭。

trans-unit.source: Star Compass
trans-unit.target: 繁星罗盘

trans-unit.resname: SPG·18 | Star Compass | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add one mana of any color that a basic land you control could produce.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由你操控的基本地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.source: Ghostly Prison
trans-unit.target: 魂魅拘禁

trans-unit.resname: SPG·19 | Ghostly Prison | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Creatures can't attack you unless their controller pays {2} for each creature they control that's attacking you.
trans-unit.target: 对每个生物而言，除非其操控者为其支付{2}，否则它不能攻击你。

trans-unit.source: Fabricate
trans-unit.target: 装配

trans-unit.source: Search your library for an artifact card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张神器牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·21 | Show and Tell | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Show and Tell
trans-unit.target: 谆谆教诲

trans-unit.resname: SPG·21 | Show and Tell | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Each player may put an artifact, creature, enchantment, or land card from their hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 每位牌手均可以将一张神器，生物，结界或地牌从其手上放进战场。

trans-unit.source: Tragic Slip
trans-unit.target: 悲剧失足

trans-unit.resname: SPG·22 | Tragic Slip | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-1 until end of turn.\nMorbid — That creature gets -13/-13 until end of turn instead if a creature died this turn.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-1直到回合结束。 丧心～如果本回合中有生物死去，则改为该生物得-13/-13直到回合结束。

trans-unit.source: Victimize
trans-unit.target: 生体活祭

trans-unit.source: Choose two target creature cards in your graveyard. Sacrifice a creature. If you do, return the chosen cards to the battlefield tapped.
trans-unit.target: 选择两张目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。牺牲一个生物。如果你如此作，则将所选之牌横置移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Gamble
trans-unit.target: 赌博

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，随机弃一张牌，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.source: Crashing Footfalls
trans-unit.target: 坏灭足迹

trans-unit.resname: SPG·25 | Crashing Footfalls | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Suspend 4—{G} (Rather than cast this card from your hand, pay {G} and exile it with four time counters on it. At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a time counter. When the last is removed, you may cast it without paying its mana cost.)\nCreate two 4/4 green Rhino creature tokens with trample.
trans-unit.target: 延缓4～{G}（除了从你手上施放此牌，你能支付{G}并将它放逐，且上面有四个计时指示物。在你的维持开始时，从其上移去一个计时指示物。当移去最后一个时，你可以施放它且不需支付其法术力费用。） 派出两个4/4绿色，具践踏异能的犀牛衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Tireless Tracker
trans-unit.target: 不倦追迹人

trans-unit.resname: SPG·26 | Tireless Tracker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, investigate. (Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with "{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.")\nWhenever you sacrifice a Clue, put a +1/+1 counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 地落～每当一个地在你的操控下进战场时，探查。（派出一个线索衍生物。它是具有「{2}，牺牲此神器：抓一张牌」的神器。） 每当你牺牲一个线索时，在CARDNAME上放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Drown in the Loch
trans-unit.target: 拖入湖底

trans-unit.resname: SPG·27 | Drown in the Loch | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Choose one —\n• Counter target spell with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.\n• Destroy target creature with mana value less than or equal to the number of cards in its controller's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 选择一项～ •反击目标咒语，且其法术力值须等于或小于其操控者坟墓场中牌的数量。 •消灭目标生物，且其法术力值须等于或小于其操控者坟墓场中牌的数量。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Field of the Dead
trans-unit.target: 亡者旷野

trans-unit.resname: SPG·28 | Field of the Dead | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{T}: Add {C}.\nWhenever CARDNAME or another land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands with different names, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{C}。 每当CARDNAME或另一个地在你的操控下进战场时，若你操控七个或更多名称各不相同的地，则派出一个2/2黑色灵俑衍生生物。

trans-unit.source: Stoneforge Mystic
trans-unit.target: 锻石秘教徒
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·29 | Stoneforge Mystic | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Equipment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.\n{1}{W}, {T}: You may put an Equipment card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张武具牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。{1}{W}，{T}：你可以将一张武具牌从你手上放进战场。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Brazen Borrower
trans-unit.target: 厚颜借物灵
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·30 | Brazen Borrower | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nFlying\nCARDNAME can block only creatures with flying.
trans-unit.target: 闪现飞行CARDNAME只能阻挡具飞行异能的生物。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Petty Theft
trans-unit.target: 小偷小摸
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·30 | Petty Theft | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Return target nonland permanent an opponent controls to its owner's hand.
trans-unit.target: 将目标由对手操控的非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Desertion
trans-unit.target: 离弃
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Counter target spell. If an artifact or creature spell is countered this way, put that card onto the battlefield under your control instead of into its owner's graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标咒语。如果以此法反击了神器或生物咒语，则改为将该牌在你的操控下放进战场，而非置入其拥有者的坟墓场。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "It is one thing to run away. It is quite another to escape your fate."\n—Oko
trans-unit.target: 「逃离现场是一回事。逃避命运则是完全不同的另一回事。」～瓯柯
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Morbid Opportunist
trans-unit.target: 病态投机者
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·32 | Morbid Opportunist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more other creatures die, draw a card. This ability triggers only once each turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个其他生物死去时，抓一张牌。此异能每回合只会触发一次。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "It's downright selfish to die with full pockets."
trans-unit.target: 「口袋满满的就死掉，这也太自私了。」
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Port Razer
trans-unit.target: 港口劫盗
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·33 | Port Razer | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, untap each creature you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase.\nCARDNAME can't attack a player it has already attacked this turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，重置所有由你操控的生物。在此阶段后，额外多出一个战斗阶段。CARDNAME不能攻击它本回合中攻击过的牌手。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "We're taking back what's ours. And a little bit of what's yours."
trans-unit.target: 「我们要拿回原本就是我们的东西。再拿走一些你的东西。」
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Scapeshift
trans-unit.target: 变境
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Sacrifice any number of lands. Search your library for up to that many land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲任意数量的地。从你牌库中搜寻至多该数量的地牌，将它们横置放进战场，然后洗牌。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "These people come from their cities and think to tame the wilderness. They forget that here, the wilderness has a head start."\n—Selvala
trans-unit.target: 「刚从城里出来的人，都觉得自己有能力驯服荒野。殊不知在这里，荒野比他们更有能力。」～塞瓦拉
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Mystic Snake
trans-unit.target: 秘术异蛇
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·35 | Mystic Snake | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, counter target spell.
trans-unit.target: 闪现当CARDNAME进战场时，反击目标咒语。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Travelers who have reached the headwaters of Fool's Fall say that strange serpents dwell in the waters there, though none can recall any more than that.
trans-unit.target: 曾到过愚人瀑源头的旅行者都说，那边的水里有怪蛇出没，但所有人的记忆均到此为止。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Notion Thief
trans-unit.target: 心念盗贼
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·36 | Notion Thief | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nIf an opponent would draw a card except the first one they draw in each of their draw steps, instead that player skips that draw and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 闪现如果某对手将抓一张牌，且这不是其于自己的每个抓牌步骤中所抓的第一张牌，则改为该牌手略过该次抓牌且你抓一张牌。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "All these childhood memories are getting in the way of the vault codes."
trans-unit.target: 「你这些儿时记忆妨碍了我寻找宝库密码。」
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Desert
trans-unit.target: 沙漠
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: {T}: Add {C}.\n{T}: CARDNAME deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。{T}：CARDNAME对目标进行攻击的生物造成1点伤害。只能于战斗结束步骤中起动。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: "Only a fool goes out there unprepared. If the heat doesn't get you, the time alone with your thoughts likely will."\n—Ertha Jo, frontier mentor
trans-unit.target: 「只有傻子才会两手空空就闯进沙漠。就算你没有很快被热死，待久了也会被孤独思绪闷死。」～边疆导师尔莎乔
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: Prismatic Vista
trans-unit.target: 澈光远景
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.resname: SPG·38 | Prismatic Vista | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {T}，支付1点生命，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之放进战场，然后洗牌。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。

trans-unit.source: When Kellan let his eyes wander to the horizon, he saw a land whose destiny was as uncertain as his own.
trans-unit.target: 凯澜放眼地平线，发现这个世界的命运也跟自己一般动荡不宁。
trans-unit.note: 临时数据，待Gatherer录入牌张信息后替换。
